QuestData.Title: Corrupting Influence?
QuestData.Description: As you search through the belongings of the dead furbolg lying before you, a small charm, very obviously created by trolls, spills out onto the ground.$B$BTouching the charm, you immediately get a sense that something is not right about the wood. A feeling of unease, of corruption, permeates the object.$B$BWrapping it in some spare cloth, you put it in your pack and resolve to show it to Raene Wolfrunner when next you find yourself in Astranaar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Troll Charm to Raene Wolfrunner at Astranaar in Ashenvale.
QuestData.RewardText: A troll charm? What are the furbolg doing with such a thing?$B$BYou're right, it does have a feeling of corruption about it... even I can sense that.$B$BThere's someone here who might be able to help.
